titleInfo.title: Death of Sir Edward Pakenham scene

subject.topic: New Orleans, Battle of, New Orleans, La., 1815

mods.abstract: Engraved scene, "Battle of New Orleans--Death of General Pakenham." Pakenham falls mortally wounded from his horse as British and American soldiers clash. Wounded men and a drum lie on the ground. Americans fire from the rampart. Engraved by Albert Bobbett
mods.accessCondition: While TSLA houses an item, it does not necessarily hold the copyright on the item, nor may it be able to determine if the item is still protected under current copyright law.
